summary: 7/9/17  BRAKE PEDAL ON MY 2013 FORD EDGE WENT TO THE FLOOR WHILE MAKING A SUDDEN STOP ALMOST REAR ENDING THE VEHICLE IN FRONT OF ME.  BRAKE PEDAL MADE A SOUND LIKE A BALLOON DEFLATING AS IT WENT TO THE FLOOR.  EVEN IN PARK THE BRAKE PEDAL WOULD TRAVEL TO THE FLOOR MAKING THE SOUND OF A DEFLATING BALLOON.   TOOK THE CAR TO THE SHOP AND WAS DIAGNOSED AS A BRAKE BOOSTER FAILURE COSTING ME $630.   MILEAGE IS 46,000
